title: Blocks from historical Downtown Pleasanton, Barbecue/Lounge Area
posting_body: ['Welcome to Pleasanton Heights Apartment Homes!', 'Community amenities include beautiful garden walkways, assigned covered parking, a sparkling swimming pool and stunning views of the hills.', 'Plus, a fully equipped fitness center and on-site laundry facilities add convenience to your life on a daily basis.', 'If you’re looking for apartments, Pleasanton, CA is an ideal location, especially when you make Pleasanton Heights your home.', '- Professional management & maintenance team', '- Fully equipped fitness center', '- 24 hours on-site laundry facility', '- Public transportation nearby', '- Barbecue/Lounge Area', '- Many options to pay rent including, credit card, on-line and ACH', '- Assigned covered parking', '- Beautiful views of the Pleasanton Hills and Mt. Diablo', '- Near major Tri-valley employment centers, shopping, dining & entertainment', '- Blocks from historical Downtown Pleasanton', '- Sparkling swimming pool with sun deck', 'Call:', 'show contact info', 'For more information, visit us at: <URL>', 'Pricing is subject to change.', 'Call for details.']
